name: oneflow
description: OneFlow - Plan to Bill in One Place

scripts.db:wipe: docker exec oneflow-postgres psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS oneflow;" && docker exec oneflow-postgres psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE oneflow;" && npm run db:migrate:deploy
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:fresh: npm run db:wipe && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=client
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=server && npm run test --workspace=client
